snippet: President Obama declared victory at home in his quest for an ambitious climate agreement, six years after a climate pact in Copenhagen left many disappointed.
abstract: Pres Obama's success at steering world leaders towards landmark climate agreement in Paris reflects fruits of hard-won diplomatic experience; second-term focus on fighting global warming is crucial addition to his legacy, alongside Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: President Obama declared victory at home in his quest for an ambitious climate agreement, six years after a climate pact in Copenhagen left many disappointed.

headline.main: Obama, Once a Guest, Is Now a Leader in World Talks
headline.print_headline: President, Once a Guest, Now a Leader in World Talks

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
